snippet.title: Who Pressed Mute on Uncle Marcus? | Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1628130?utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=teaser_trailer
Play here: https://walesinter.link/unclemarcus 

An eccentric, live-action, interactive murder mystery with a twist: someone has attempted murder on Uncle Marcus during the yearly family quiz. Uncover the truth and try to save him before it is too late.

Starring:
Andy Buckley (The Office)
Robbie Kay (Once Upon a Time, Pinocchio)
Georgia Small (Five Dates, Bloodshore)
Al Weaver (The Complex)
Abigail Hardingham
Eileen Davies
Gabrielle Glaister
Susannah Doyle

Coming to PC, PS5, PS4, Xbox One, Series X|S, Switch, iOS, Android on 18th March. Pre-order now and save 10% on select platforms.

Twitter: https://twitter.com/WalesInter
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/WalesInteractive
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/walesinteractive
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/publisher/WalesInteractive
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/walesinteractive
Wales Interactive: https://www.walesinteractive.com

#UncleMarcus #FMV #MurderMystery
